entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3 except 8 in the Postville area. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3 except 8 in the Postville area. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of rain showers near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
